short_summary: Publishing, marketing, and distribution services for the House of Commons for $***********
description: Legal description of the contract provided by the government
full_summary:
**Publishing, Marketing and Distribution Services for the House of Commons**
================================	stmt=========

**Reference:** 2023033
------------

**Description:**
The House of Commons is seeking a supplier to provide publishing, marketing, and distribution services for the Fourth Edition of House of Commons Procedure and Practice. This includes layout, printing, binding, and printing of a dust jacket, as well as producing a PDF version. The successful supplier will be responsible for publishing, marketing, and distributing the Fourth Edition.

**Request for Proposal/Quotation:**
This is a Request for Proposal/Quotation (RFP/Q), and interested suppliers can respond by visiting the MERX website at [https://www.merx.com/solicitations/open-bids/Publishing-marketing-and-distribution-services-for-the-House-of-Commons/0000269453?origin=0](https://www.merx.com/solicitations/open-bids/Publishing-marketing-and-distribution-services-for-the-House-of-Commons/0000269453?origin=0).

**Tender Details:**

*   *Publication date*: 2024-05-01
*   *Closing date*: 2024-05-22 14:00:00
*   *Contracting authority*: House of Commons
*   *Location*: National Capital Region (NCR)
*   *Notice type*: Request for Proposal
*   *Procurement method*: Competitive – Open bidding

**Selection criteria:**
The successful supplier will be selected based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Contact information:**

*   *Senior Contracting Officer*: Kaouthar Gherairi
*   *Email*: <contractingserv@parl.gc.ca>
*   *Phone*: +1 613-992-8868

**Important:** The House of Commons is not responsible for tender notices and related documents that are not accessed directly through MERX. Suppliers are advised to ensure that they access the RFP/Q through the official MERX website to ensure accuracy and timeliness. Thank you for your interest in this opportunity. We look forward to reviewing your proposal.
